lessons.title: Semantic HTML
lessons.content:
# Essential to know
- Semantic tags describe meaning: `<header>`, `<nav>`, `<main>`, `<article>`, `<footer>`
- Better than generic `<div>` for accessibility and SEO
- Screen readers use semantic tags to navigate
- `<section>` groups related content, `<aside>` for sidebars

---
